channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4771|2024-06-06T19:52:20.334Z -- mozilla -- firefox
item.description: A memory allocation check was missing which would lead to a use-after-free if the allocation failed. This could have triggered a crash or potentially be leveraged to achieve code execution. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 126.

item.title: CVE-2024-2616|2024-03-19T12:02:58.997Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
item.description: To harden ICU against exploitation, the behavior for out-of-memory conditions was changed to crash instead of attempt to continue. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.9 and Thunderbird < 115.9.
